bug.author: andrster1
bug.summary: [BUG] VIBE output pkl file is empty when applied to a short video of 20 frames
bug.description: Hello, as stated in the title, the resulting pkl file is empty when I run VIBE on a video consisting of 20 frames.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/andrster1>@andrster1</denchmark-link> , You can solve this issue by setting this line to a value less than 20: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mkocabas/VIBE/blob/master/demo.py#L48>https://github.com/mkocabas/VIBE/blob/master/demo.py#L48</denchmark-link> .
